testcase.name: Log in to SwagLabs, Add Item to basket, Checkout
testcase.system-out: Given I have opened the SwagLabs login page.................................passed And I login to SwagLab with valid credentials...............................passed And I validate the Product page.............................................passed And I select an "Sauce Labs Bike Light" from the Product page...............passed When I add "Sauce Labs Bike Light" the to the cart..........................passed And I Navigate to the shopping cart.........................................passed And I validate the "Sauce Labs Bike Light" in Shopping Cart.................passed And I enter checkout credentials............................................passed And I validate the "Sauce Labs Bike Light" checkout details.................passed Then I verify order has been completed......................................passed
